content: work in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to mark start of round rnds 1 4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round mitt rnds 5 6 k round 7 m1 k1 m1 k to end 20 sts round 8 k round 9 m1 k3 m1 k to end 22 sts round 10 k round 11 m1 k5 m1 k to end 24 sts p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2021 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 10012021
